title: min min的档案
content:
**SCP：**

* [[[SCP-632]]] - 严重的头痛/侵入性蜘蛛形思维（重写）
* [[[SCP-932]]] - 猎梦者
* [[[SCP-1373]]] - 镭射幼鲨
* [[[SCP-2211]]] - .wmv，.wav，.exe和一个咖啡机
* [[[SCP-2838]]] - 恒星转世
* [[[SCP-2965]]] - 小马快车
* [[[SCP-2232]]] - 禽鸟手机。非同凡想。
* [[[SCP-2898]]] - A Persistence of Memory
* [[[SCP-796]]] - 河猫（重写）
* [[[SCP-2696]]] - 黑峰闹鬼公馆
* [[[SCP-2747]]]- 戏里戏外，其实为一
* [[[SCP-2949]]] - 被电视转播的猫科动物迁徙
* [[[SCP-2535]]] - 进食的打印机和打印的食客
* [[[SCP-2498]]] - 虹光身（和Rimple一起想的点子）
* [[[SCP-3100]]] - 遗骨匣
* [[[SCP-2659]]] - 鳍鲸魂者
* [[[SCP-3099]]] - 过激性暴力
* [[[SCP-3250]]] - 耶德基（与Lily合著）
* [[[SCP-3366]]] - 陷洞之人
* [[[SCP-3414]]] - 小心厕中蛇
* [[[SCP-3904]]] - 两只穿皮衣的猫
* [[[SCP-3558]]] - 眼睑切除器
* [[[SCP-3611]]] - The Yamauchi Deck
* [[[SCP-3786]]] - Chubby Dog
* [[[SCP-4727]]] - 逐梦之枪
* [[[SCP-4904]]] - 光盘快速移动睡眠
 

**故事：**

* [[[the-woven-man |纺织人]]]: [*https://vimeo.com/170897729 朗读1]/[*https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6rsnsH8OzQQ 朗读2]
* [[[the-other-side |The Other Side]]]
* [[[Love Springs Eternal |永恒的爱泉]]]
* [[[hint-the-thing-is-173 |五个贡品的故事]]]
* [[[clouds |云]]]
* [[[scp-2696-attached-documentation |SCP-2696附加文件]]]
* [[[to-clean-out-a-night |To Clean out a Night...]]]：[[[SCP-2696]]]外围
* [[[hello-little-girl |你好，小女孩]]]：[[[skies-made-strange-hub |在显得陌生的天穹中心页]]]故事之一，2018末日竞赛作品，参与中心写作的还有Jekeled、Decibelles和TyGently。
* [[[re-stacks|First Welcome]]]：给TyGently写的圣诞故事。
* 死冥权能 ([*https://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/necropotence 中心], [*https://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/as-on-a-darkling-plain Prelude], [*https://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/ignorant-armies-clash-by-night Tip of the Spear])：2020设定复兴竞赛参赛作品。参与中心写作的还有ARD、Taffeta、（据称还有）Kalinin。
* [[[*altered-by-all-means-necessary |a fistful of frantic movements]]]：[[[SCP-2747]]]外围。

**图书馆：**
* [*https://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/wanderers:big-red 深红]
* [*http://wanderers-library.wikidot.com/excerpt-from-a-journal-found-in-a-brightly-lit-city Excerpt from a journal found in a brightly lit city]
* [*https://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/wanderers:drowning 溺]
* [*http://wanderers-library.wikidot.com/the-castle-and-the-mirror The Castle and the Mirror]
* [*https://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/wanderers:on-dryads 关于树妖]
* [*http://wanderers-library.wikidot.com/into-stony-woods-and-out Into Stony Woods and Out]
* [*http://wanderers-library.wikidot.com/seasons-greetings Seasons' Greetings]：写给rumetzen的圣诞故事。
* [*https://wanderers-library.wikidot.com/mirrorman Mirrorman]
* [*https://wanderers-library.wikidot.com/ferryman Ferryman]
* [*https://wanderers-library.wikidot.com/stories-from-a-slightly-stranger-island Stories from a slightly stranger island]
* [*http://wanderers-library.wikidot.com/there-is-dust-on-my-mind There is Dust on my Mind]
* The War in Zrnyowycz ([*https://wanderers-library.wikidot.com/the-war-in-zrnyowycz 中心], [*https://wanderers-library.wikidot.com/the-war-comes-to-markettown The War Comes to Markettown], [*https://wanderers-library.wikidot.com/midnight-grey-goose Midnight Grey Goose]): 2021图书馆竞赛参赛作品，与ARD、Taffeta、TyGently共同完成。

**其它：**

* [[[And then I died3 |然后我死了……第三部分]]]，第22和27条
* [[[Surprise happy birthday 5 |惊喜！生日快乐！现在，来看看这儿……]]]，"Josie"
* [[[Surprise happy birthday 6 |惊喜！生日快乐！现在，仔细听听这些……]]]，蹒跚
* [[[Surprise happy birthday 8 |Gears' Birthday, 2020]]], "Red Earth"
* [[[Surprise happy birthday 9 |Gears' Birthday, 2021]]], "The Tower Heart"
* [[[Exploration log 2474 1 |Exploration log of SCP-2474]]]：2016MTF竞赛作品，与Kalinin、Zyn、Von Pincier合著

目前为止（2019- ）的著作见此：
//[*http://anafabulic.wordpress.com/ 水与井]//。
